name: RoadGames
description:
Mother is sleeping. Now we can play...
...But mother said the road is dangerous.

How long can you play before the road claims you?

RoadGames is a local 2 player game where you play football in the road while avoiding cars. The game features both a coop and a versus mode, one where you have to keep a combo going for as long an possible, and one where you try to score in your opponents goal.

The game is made in Unreal 4 using paper 2d
